website_summaries.verdict: A carpet powder that not only freshens but banishes pet parasites hidden in carpet fibers.
pros: Kills fleas and ticks and prevents them for up to 12 months
Canister holds enough powder to treat up to 400 square feet
cons: Reapplication is necessary for complete eradication of fleas

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize the hazards of using this product and it’s not returnable (I didn’t know this either!) needless to say I won’t be using this product as the warnings are like so: don’t enter the area until powder is removed, keep pets and humans away, keep away from skin/clothing contact. Deficiency for the trash. I’ll stick with iodized salt to battle the fleas..
customer_reviews.author: flower child

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn’t have ordered this
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these but then after reading the warning labels on the product we got way too scared to use. Basically sounds like literal poison to both humans and animals so we decided it just wasn’t worth the risk. Also you can only treat a 3 x 3 area per room? So what’s the point?
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh B.

customer_reviews.title: If you like your package covered in white powder...
customer_reviews.text: It smells great! We should know, because the stuff was everywhere. Except in the canister. There was barely any in there. Suffice to say, we’re not happy with shipping method, or lack thereof. Save yourself a headache and buy it at a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I think the product smells pretty good. It's not too overpowering like some carpet powders. The jury is still out on if it helped with the fleas on my cats but it was easy to apply and vacuum up the next day.
customer_reviews.author: IvyLimieux

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Very little odor. Probably dustier than I would have liked, but not terrible. Left it overnight, and vacuumed in the morning. I tried a spray first, but I should have started with this. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Get something stronger
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Pre treated carpet with a carpet cleaner, swept the carpet after it dried, then applied this and scrubbed it into the carpet everywhere. 1 hour later I walk back through the room and my socks are covered in fleas so I think they will die with time...nope! 24 hours later they are all still alive and kicking after vaccuning twice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: You're buying all but getting half.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, shipping not great at all, I love getting half a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more but good value
customer_reviews.text: smelled amazing. Left our carpet fresh. Seemed to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow Nasser

customer_reviews.title: Fatal to pets
customer_reviews.text: Did not use cause it is fatal to my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did a very good job at killing the fleas. I will tell others about it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, used in upper / lower duplex house 2 bedrooms worth of product if used resourceful between rooms. Recommended vacuum twice afterwards and keep pets out of room until the product is fully cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Kodrich

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: hare to tell if it actually worked. Fleas are hard to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: R. O'Herin

customer_reviews.title: ... the items were broken on arrival and had a super harsh smell other than that got the job done ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items were broken on arrival and had a super harsh smell other than that got the job done 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the can was crushed and open. I had to put tape over the split to use. I know you are jammed , but the warehouse guys need to slow down and try to be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Return impossible
customer_reviews.text: Why I can not return it, because line CONFIRM YOUR RETURN is not active. I do not more PETARMOR HOME CARPET POWDER. Please, help me. Raisa Sonina
customer_reviews.author: Raisa

customer_reviews.title: This product was not useful in combating our flea issues
customer_reviews.text: We treated our pets, vacuumed the area and followed the instructions for the carpet powder. We had adult fleas and tiny ones to contend with. Not even three days later, the tiny ones were still a huge problem and we had to once again, shampoo our carpeting and wait to RE treat the it all over again, not with PetArmor Home Carpet Powder. I will say that the scent is pleasant, not at all like a pesticide.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Freeman

product_meta.title: PETARMOR Home Carpet Powder for Fleas and Ticks, Protect Your Home From Fleas and Deodorizes Carpets, 16 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Your pets are family, and PetArmor helps you confidently care for your pets, and your home-especially when it comes to flea and tick control. PetArmor conveniently provides vet-quality protection without the expense of a vet visit. PetArmor Carpet Powder kills fleas, flea eggs, flea larvae, flea pupae, and brown dog ticks hiding around your home. This flea & tick treatment for home covers 200 to 400 square feet and works for up to a year, effectively disrupting the flea life cycle. This home flea treatment starts working within 24 hours. Armor your pet with America's #1 flea & tick brand.

* To apply, shake over affected areas. Allow the powder to remain in place for 24 hours before vacuuming. If you cannot stay off the treated areas for a full 24 hours, let the product rest for a least 1 hour before vacuuming.

*Safety tip: Always read the directions thoroughly when using any flea and tick product.

* Nielsen Total US xAOC+Pet Specialty, latest 52 weeks ending 12/30/2017. PetArmor includes PetArmor, PetArmor Plus, PetArmor FastCaps & PetArmor Advanced II.
feature_bullets: PET ODOR: PetArmor Flea and Tick Home and Carpet Spray freshens and deodorizes carpets, has a clean fresh scent, and is available in a 16 oz. ounce size.
EFFECTIVE AGAINST PESTS: PetArmor Home Powder kills brown dog ticks, fleas, and flea eggs, flea larvae, and flea pupae.
PROTECT YOUR HOME: Find fleas or ticks on your pet? They are probably in your home. Fleas lay up to 50 eggs a day. PetArmor Home Carpet Power helps you in the fight against fleas and ticks.
PETS ARE FAMILY: PetArmor flea and tick home products help you confidently protect your furry family member from fleas and ticks at home without a visit to the vet.
LONG LASTING CONTROL: PetArmor Home & Carpet Spray kills all stages of fleas and protects against reinfestation for up to 7 months. Kills fleas, dust mites and lice.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
